price: 68. Hadday kula doodaan, dheh: Alle baa dhab u ogsoon waxaad fashaan.
arabic: وَإِن جَٰدَلُوكَ فَقُلِ ٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-in jādalūka faquli al-lahu aʿlamu bimā taʿmalūna
